sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Sets 'com.snc.incident.create_from_interaction.save' property to false on upgrade .</description> <name>Set Interaction to Incident properties</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { if (GlidePluginManager.isZboot()) return; gs.setProperty('com.snc.incident.create_from_interaction.save', false); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-10-09 18:26:33</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d47bdb9a53033010b569ddeeff7b12ee</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Interaction to Incident properties</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Incident" source="com.snc.incident">d596b0643cb1311068bcf327dfe37f08</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d47bdb9a53033010b569ddeeff7b12ee</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-18 11:10:41</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>true</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
